item.title: ADEM-VL: Adaptive and Embedded Fusion for Efficient Vision-Language Tuning
item.description: ADEM-VL: A novel vision-language tuning framework achieves state-of-the-art accuracy with significantly reduced computational cost and parameters, using a parameter-free cross-attention mechanism and …

item.title: Lightweight Neural App Control
item.description: LiMAC, a lightweight neural app control architecture, uses a hybrid approach combining a small Action Transformer with a fine-tuned vision-language model for precise, real-time mobile app control, out…

item.title: MIA-DPO: Multi-Image Augmented Direct Preference Optimization For Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: MIA-DPO boosts large vision-language model performance on multi-image tasks by cleverly augmenting single-image data and using attention mechanisms to filter out inaccurate responses.

item.title: Scalable Ranked Preference Optimization for Text-to-Image Generation

item.title: Scaling Diffusion Language Models via Adaptation from Autoregressive Models
item.description: Researchers efficiently adapt large autoregressive language models into competitive diffusion language models, overcoming previous scalability challenges and demonstrating improved performance on vari…

item.title: Value Residual Learning For Alleviating Attention Concentration In Transformers
item.description: ResFormer & SVFormer alleviate Transformer attention concentration, boosting performance and reducing memory needs, paving the way for more efficient large language models.
